subject: Re: [junit] Before/After Category
msgSnippet: You can use @BeforeClass and @AfterClass (or a @ClassRule) in a class that uses the Suite runner. The Categories runner extends suite. -- Kevin ... [Non-text
messageBody:
You can use @BeforeClass and @AfterClass (or a @ClassRule) in a class that
uses the Suite runner. The Categories runner extends suite.

-- Kevin

On Wed, Jan 30, 2013 at 7:47 AM, wojnos <esperanto@...> wrote:

> **
>
>
> Hi,
>
> Is there a way to run some code before/after a category? Similarly to
> Before/After class.
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Przemek
>
>
>
